DocAttribute.Name: RelatedObjects
DocAttribute.Documentation: Related objects, which are assigned to a single object. The type of the single (or relating) object is defined in the subtypes of IfcRelAssigns.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedObjectsType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Particular type of the assignment relationship. It can constrain the applicable object types, used within the role of RelatedObjects.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Rule checks whether the types of the assigned related objects comply with the contraint given by the RelatedObjectsType. The rule is important for constraint checks at subtypes of IfcRelAssigns or at subtypes of IfcObject, which refers to assignment relationships through the inverse HasAssignments relation.
